title: Final Boss Veigar preps for the ultimate battle

replies.body: Well I certainly hope this won't be a **Short** boss fight. I don't want to be **Let Down**
Oh, quit thinking **little** of him, champions of his stature are in **short** supply.
{{champion:45}}  EVEN NOW YOUR LOVED ONES SUFFER!
Guys I think that {{champion:45}}  might be getting a **tiny** bit tired of these jokes.
yeah me too he has a very **short** temper

Yeah, I think you're hitting **below the belt** at this point. Whatever **minor** issues you have with {{champion:45}}, you have to recognize that this skin **dwarfs** the **little** set of options he had before. I doubt you'll get a **rise** out of him.
This is why I love the League of Legends community.
If any more of these jokes are made, I'm sure Veigar will personally visit you and **cut you down to size**.
At this point, his patience *must* be to a **minimum**
When did we start talking about Edward Elric?
Leave me out of this... besides, I'm not short!
Exactly.  He may be purple, but he's no **shrinking violet**.
{{champion:45}} IS THAT A SHORT JOKE?!
It's a **small** one.
Being a final boss is no **small** feat.
If you think of Veigar in terms of a **Mini**boss, then the fight won't be **Short** at all. But as a final boss, the fight falls **Short** and takes **Little** time.
Stop making fun of Veigar just because he doesn't **measure** up to your standards.
now we just need a top laner to complete the arcade series of viegar mid hecarim jung and mf and sona bot
you mean arcade nasus?
He would make the same sound with his ult Mario makes when grabbing a mushroom.
we need an arcade {{champion:4}} using a Mario pipe when he tps with his ult
THIS IS GOLD
This guy here knows what's up.
ARCADE {{champion:17}}
How would they make an arcade Satan skin?
Its probably going to be Arcade {{champion:41}} . If you look in the background of Arcade {{champion:21}}, you can see Gangplank chasing after that booty.
arcade nasus rito plz
